welcome_message.help:
The message that sends when a user joins your server, only works if `welcome_message_channel` is set.
**Type:** String

welcome_message_channel.help:
The channel that receives a message when a user joins your server,
False means off, String means channel name, Integer means channel id.
**Type:** False/String/Integer

allow_invites_channel.help:
The channel that invites are allowed in,
False means off, String means channel name, Integer means channel id.
**Type:** False/String/Integer
